Takeaway from HTML

What we covered

In the last chapter, here's a brief summary of what was covered:

  • Most web pages serve HTML documents
  • HTML has many different tags, which are used to create nested elements
  • Elements have attributes, which can be used to group them together, identify them, and change their appearance
  • Elements can have their appearance changed with CSS

What we did

In addition to our learnings, we also made a grid of dots on a black background. It's still ugly and needs work.
